definition: tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc

sentences.english: You only missed the freesia and the roses.
sentences.chinese: 你只漏掉了鸢尾草和玫瑰。

sentences.english: The scent of roses and orange blossom and freesia enveloped me in a soft mist.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰和橙花还有鸢尾草的香气弥漫，将我笼罩在其中。

sentences.english: Do not water the bearded iris.
Flower-de- luce climbed all the braes one by one to overlook the visit of darkness like Psalters.
sentences.chinese: 鸢尾花渐次爬上所有的山坡，眺望黑色的诗篇降临。

sentences.english: Iris was a pretty butterfly in blue and purple.
sentences.chinese: 鸢尾花为蓝紫色，花形似翩翩起舞的蝴蝶。

sentences.english: Such is the color of its iris.
sentences.chinese: 岸边的鸢尾花也是这种颜色。

sentences.english: It is suggested to be used together with Flower-De-Luce Balanced Cleaning Series of Products for better effect.
sentences.chinese: 配合鸢尾花平衡净肤系列产品使用，效果更佳。

sentences.english: Golden is Gesang and Flower-de-luce is blue.
sentences.chinese: 金色的格桑和蓝色的鸢尾。

sentences.english: The Wild Iris At the end of my suffering there was a door.
sentences.chinese: 野鸢尾在我的痛苦之端有门一扇。

sentences.english: A possum laid down the bearded iris field.
sentences.chinese: 一只白鼻心躺在鸢尾兰区。

sentences.english: The dwarf iris reticulata blooms with the crocuses.
sentences.chinese: 矮小的网脉鸢尾与番红花一起开花。

sentences.english: Oxidizing agent and reducing agent make Iris typhifolia Kitag solution decline to colorless.
sentences.chinese: 氧化剂和还原剂会迅速使北陵鸢尾色素溶液降至无色。

sentences.english: The dwarf iris reticulata blooms withthecrocuses.
sentences.chinese: 矮小的网脉鸢尾与番红花一起开花。

sentences.english: Chromosome numbers of thirteen iridaceous species from Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江几种鸢尾科植物的染色体。

sentences.english: The fragrant rootstock of the orris can be used in producing perfumes and cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 鸢尾草的根茎可用于生产香水和化妆品。
一列火车在这鸢尾花里。
